title: LMS Assignment Submission Error
description: A student is receiving an error message when trying to upload their assignment to the LMS.

tasks.description: Identify the student, course, and specific assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the context of the problem.

tasks.description: Ask the student for the file type and size of their assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the file is a 100MB video file, exceeding the 50MB upload limit for the assignment.

tasks.description: Advise the student to compress the file or upload it to a university-approved streaming service and submit the link instead.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a viable workaround for the student.
